name: Yukie: A Japanese Winter Fairy Tale
description: This is a theatrical story game. Lead the hero Yukiji on a journey of vengeance, to the snowy mountain where Yukie resides. The story will proceed in a movie-like fashion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6600GT Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound
